description.narrative: Namibia - Agriculture Project: the project focuses on increasing the economic performance of the agricultural sector by: 1) improving land tenure security and rangeland management practices, 2) improving animal health services and livestock marketing, and 3) increasing revenues to small and medium-sized enterprises from sustainable harvesting of natural products.

title.narrative: Improving Rangeland and Livestock Management in Namibia
Measuring Results of Namibia Livestock Support Activity
Measuring Results of the Namibia Communal Land Support Sub-Activity
Measuring Results of the Namibia Indigenous Natural Products Activity

condition.narrative: Further details on conditions precedent affecting this activity can be found in the top-level parent activities.
